articles.title: Hanover police officer charged with motor vehicle homicide in fatal Brockton hit-and-run
articles.description:
The off-duty officer allegedly hit the victim while driving himself and his friends home from a night at a Brockton strip club.

The post Hanover police officer charged with motor vehicle homicide in fatal Brockton hit-and-run appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Hanover police officer charged with motor vehicle homicide in Brockton hit-and-run incident.
Officer allegedly struck victim while driving home from a Brockton strip club on February 17.
Incident raises concerns about public safety and accountability for law enforcement in Boston.

articles.title: Choosing a product that fixes foggy headlights
articles.description:
John Paul, AAA Northeast's Car Doctor, hears from a reader offering tips for restoring headlights that have become foggy over time.

The post Choosing a product that fixes foggy headlights appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: John Paul from AAA Northeast offers tips for restoring foggy headlights.
Residents can improve visibility and safety by using recommended restoration products.
Foggy headlights can reduce nighttime driving safety for Boston drivers.

articles.title: Man arrested in Fenway on child rape, human trafficking charges
articles.description:
Talik Rashaun Garcia, 36, was arrested and charged Friday after police conducted a search of his Fenway home, Boston police said.

The post Man arrested in Fenway on child rape, human trafficking charges appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Talik Rashaun Garcia, 36, arrested in Fenway for child rape and human trafficking charges.
Police conducted a search of Garcia's home on Friday, leading to his arrest.
Residents are urged to remain vigilant and report suspicious activities in the area.

articles.title: Man charged with motor vehicle homicide in Pittsfield hit and run that saw victim dragged 4 miles, DA says
articles.description:
William Gross, 65, is facing charges after allegedly hitting and killing a 69-year-old Pittsfield man.

The post Man charged with motor vehicle homicide in Pittsfield hit and run that saw victim dragged 4 miles, DA says appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: William Gross, 65, charged with motor vehicle homicide in Pittsfield hit and run.
Victim, a 69-year-old man, was dragged 4 miles after being struck.
The incident raises concerns about pedestrian safety in Pittsfield.
